problem.markdown: Student X has water substance at a pressure and temperature of 580 N/m[mathjaxinline]^2[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]–[/mathjaxinline] 5[mathjaxinline]^\circ[/mathjaxinline]C respectively. She heats this water at isobaric conditions due to which its volume increases. This increase in volume starts when the water substance enters ( ) Solid phase (x) Solid [mathjaxinline] +[/mathjaxinline] vapour phase ( ) Liquid [mathjaxinline] +[/mathjaxinline] vapour phase ( ) Vapour phase
